website_summaries.verdict: The Otterbox iPad Pro 10.5" case is made for those who want premium protection for their tablet.
pros: Features durable triple-layer of defense with inner shell, outer slipcover, and touch screen protector
Port covers stop dirt and debris from entering tablet
Screen protector sits close to screen, making it hard to tell it’s there
cons: Not compatible with Apple Smart Keyboard or Apple Smart Cover

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I've used Otterbox Defenders on my iPhone for years, and this iPad Pro 10.5 case was exactly what I expected. It fit the iPad perfectly, so there is no movement in the case. I like how there's four positions for the stand (slightly tilted and very tilted for both portrait and landscape). If you're not familiar with the Defender series of products, know this is a thick case, and you will definitely notice a difference in the size and weight of your iPad. Personally, I found the iPad too thin for my grip, so I appreciate the thickness of this case.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Case.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice sturdy case. My iPad Pro felt too delicate in my hands. I felt like I could easily break it or it would slip out of my hands and break. After adding this case it now feels indestructible! It is not near as bulky as I thought it would be but it does add some weight. The screen is very clear and there are no "bubbles" like I found with the Lifeproof case on my old iPad. I like the bonus face protector that doubles as a stand! Other than not being waterproof, this case has it all! It is on the pricey side. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Damages iPads
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this case for your iPad Pro. My daughter and I both got one for Christmas and both our screens cracked on our iPads. Not because we dropped it or caused it, but because of the case. We went to Apple to have our screens fixed and they told us they’ve seen multiple iPads with broken screen from using this case. They said the case is simply too tight for the iPad and it puts pressure on the screen and cracks it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: The case is a bit clunky. It's large and awkward. For sure, it protects the Ipad, but so would a steel safe! The case comes in two basic parts. First there is the armor that fits directly onto the Ipad. Second, there is a snap-on cover which protects the screen when not in use. The armor part came with a plastic screen protector which was very cheap. It was a plastic film with adhesive that attached it to the armor. I removed the plastic and put some Gorilla Glass directly onto the screen instead. Hey, it works and the price was right, but I am really not impressed. I have seen much better products from Otterbox!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Case broke and OtterBox is NOT fulfilling warranty claims because of Covid
customer_reviews.text: I would seriously consider not purchasing an OtterBox product while the company somehow believes Covid is a reason not to stand behind their warranty. I'm seriously disappointed as I had always considered their products as quality and their company as solid. I won't make that mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reader

customer_reviews.title: Trying it out....
customer_reviews.text: I just received the case,the one thing I don’t like about it already is the plastic screen cover.It seems hard to glide your finger against the plastic.It may have to be removed.I also noticed sometimes you have to press hard against the screen,not just tap it like glass.This case is a replacement for SURVIVOR which I bought three months ago and the stand pins fell out...don’t buy that one.I hope this lasts longer than that one,so I’m giving it a average stars at this point.I will update after using this case longer....these cases are pricey,people just want a little protection.
customer_reviews.author: Hatter

customer_reviews.title: ... used Otter box cases for multiple devices and have loved the durability
customer_reviews.text: I have used Otter box cases for multiple devices and have loved the durability. I will have to reorder this for my new iPad, but I have to return this one, it seems to me that the mechanism to prop the iPad up?! I looked through the box again because after looking at the pictures again and even a picture someone had previously posted, we are definitely missing a piece.
customer_reviews.author: Nickie Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you have kids!
customer_reviews.text: I have two little ones who *steal* my iPad when I am not using it so after my first iPad broke due to an accidental fall I went on a mission to find a case that would protect against my clumsy kids. Initially I thought this case was too pricey but it is WORTH EVERY PENNY. I'd rather spend the money on this case then on a replacement iPad anytime. My little ones have thrown, dropped, and practically played football with my iPad with this case on and the iPad is SAFE! :)
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: This case adds a lot of weight to the iPad Air, it should have been much lighter for the price The built in screen protector is flexible plastic vs glass so it can only protect It from scratches When you put this case on The iPad it has a lot of Raised plastic that prevents you from placing your finger on the home button, only the tip of your finger can access it to use the fingerprint reader The built in stand should have multiple viewing angles
customer_reviews.author: Donald P. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to clean the plastic shield before use
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about the "OtterBox" line of products. I did have to disassemble this because there was dust on the plastic shield that I missed the first time. Believe me I was very careful the second time and made sure all of the dust was gone. The case provides a very snug and safe place for my tablet and I know that there is little I can do to offer more protection. You won't go wrong with this item, costly yes but well worth it in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: PBW

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof. But case interferes with keyboard function.
customer_reviews.text: This case seems waterproof, which is one reason that I selected it. The pencil holder inside the lid is awkward and flimsy. It broke within the first few weeks. This case causes my iPad Pro keyboard to malfunction and to be unresponsive at times. I normally swear by OtterBox and have used them happily on all prior devices. This one is a bust! It is also very cumbersome to use as it stretches the material that absorbs shock a little more each time you use it.
customer_reviews.author: goneridin2

customer_reviews.title: Best case out there!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smart cover and tech 21 back from Apple and it was scratched within a day and the cover kept snapping off when in use. The defender case has been on almost every iphone I've owned and am happy to put it on the ipad pro 10.5. The rubberized cover has a wonderful grip and won't slip and the screen protector is clear. There is a Newtonian rainbow effect on the screen between the device, but, it's not noticeable at all in use. With some extra care and lens cleaner spray, the rainbow could be removed. It honestly doesn't bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Faust

customer_reviews.title: ... two other IPads with an Otterbox case and was pleased. This one does not fit properly on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had two other IPads with an Otterbox case and was pleased. This one does not fit properly on my IPad Pro. I must remove the cover to charge and then the opening for the charger is so close the the case charger opening it is difficult to plug into. So disappointed. I wish I had known this earlier but did not use the new IPAD for several months after receiving it as a gift. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great product nice protection
customer_reviews.text: Great product nice protection, my only problem is the charging flap that you have to open to plug your charger in, puts too much force on my plug and it bent my charger and that can potentially lead to damaging your charging port on your very expensive device have a good day every
customer_reviews.author: AMZNSTU

customer_reviews.title: Allows tablet to bend and lets dirt in around cutouts
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention...because if you put your Air or Pro in this case thinking your investment is protected...think again. My Air 3 is warped like a banana...I have treated it like a king, it never left the case and was never treated roughly ever. I only discovered it on routine cleaning and I’m livid. I don’t know who is worse.. Otterbox or Apple. Both of their products are inferior and poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: DeathzDelivery

customer_reviews.title: Typical Otterbox high quality ....
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for the ultimate iPad Air 3 protective cover, this is it. I had to get this new one for my new iPad Air 3 since the Air 3 is a half inch bigger than my old Air 2 . Thanks for that Apple. But the Otterbox cover is typical high quality that Otterbox is known for. It comes with a hard plastic clip-on back cover piece, but I don't use that in my day to day use of the iPad so I took it off. I have nothing but good things to say about this cover case. If you want the best, Otterbox is it.
customer_reviews.author: Ham

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy- Fee to return item!!
customer_reviews.text: Ended up not needing it- it costs a $10 min fee for returning it!! Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Klatter

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: Item is bulky and difficult to remove cover once attached. Additionally item has a screen protector that makes it difficult to depress keys on screen considering my iPad already has a screen protector I affixed to the device. I returned the item for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly protective.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even guess at how many times I’ve fallen sleep in my chair and dropped my iPad on the floor. No damage, EVER, since I always have it one of these. Will never have an iPad or iPhone without having a Defender Otterbox cover on it. Have NEVER cracked a screen or broken one at all because of my Otterboxes. Have, and will, buy again and again, for myself and my husband. A little bulky, but I can live with that since it does such a great job protecting the electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Odd Eight

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy protective case/cover!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it covers everything including the screen. My wife has had one on her iPad for years and she is clumsy! Never had a problem with hers. So I got one for my iPad Pro. Very sturdy and doesn’t feel cheap. I’m sure it will protect my iPad for years to come! Why 4 stars? I thought the cover is difficult to remove for use. Maybe there’s a trick to removing it, but I’m struggling with taking it off to use my iPad. I guess it just won’t pop off if I ever drop it so that’s possibly a positive!
customer_reviews.author: rac927

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and is durable.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Otter Box products for many years. They have saved my apple products from damage many times. This one is no different. Slim, sleek, and tough. The screen protector keeps your IPad in brand new shape. But the main draw for me is the soft shell is on the outside, which gives you a nice grip. There are a lot of knock offs out there claiming to be Otter Box brand, this one is definitely genuine.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t use anything but!
customer_reviews.text: I used my last Otterbox for 6 years with my iPad before it finally fell apart. I carry my iPad with me everywhere, so you can imagine the abuse it could’ve taken. The Otterbox saved it more than once. When I finally had to buy a new iPad, it was just a no brainer that another Otterbox would be ordered. This one does fit a bit tighter than the other, making the cover just a tad bit tough to get off. If you e never used an Otterbox before, you should know that they are bulkier than the other covers you can buy, but the purpose is to protect - and it does - in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Mothershopper

customer_reviews.title: Must buy to protect devices
customer_reviews.text: Second one I’ve bought, first was for Samsung tablet and second one I upgraded to iPad. Very strong, it protects your device from damage. Chipped the corner on my first one, but it did slip out of my hand and go down 1/2 flight of stairs, no damage to device (did have stick on screen protector also). Love otter box only brand to buy. Little pricey, but you get what you pay for. They last along time do in the end you get your money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie8119

customer_reviews.title: Very good case! Screen protector issues
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. However if your iPad already had on a screen protector, installation of this case with its screen protector will reduce touch sensitivity majorly. In my situation I removed the screen protector that came with the otter box case and continued to use my original screen protector which is more high quality than what came with the case. Be careful not to damage the case while removing the screen protector. There is a strong adhesive that can be removed using isopropyl alcohol and a mild synthetic cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otter box screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased many otter boxes. Every otter box I’ve removed their screen protector and add my own. The otter box screen protectors never work well. Dirt gets trapped underneath, and they feel puffy as they don’t sit firmly against the screen. The rest of the case is nice however I’ve noticed how the flaps that protect the battery charger port eventually wear and rip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox always delivers!
customer_reviews.text: As always, OtterBox has delivered yet another great product! Not only does it di a great job protecting your device but their customer service is fantastic!! I only buy OtterBox for my devices because their history has proven itself. I drop my phone a LOT and not one time has been damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi VanD

customer_reviews.title: it's sturdy and will definitely protect your ipad but if you ...
customer_reviews.text: I know the point is to protect the ipad, but this is a bit bulkier than necessary, it seems. It's difficult to access the charging port through the rubber gasket. Accessing the apple pencil inside the ase is also inconvenient. Overall, it's sturdy and will definitely protect your ipad but if you don't work on a construction site (like I sometimes do), this might be overkill for you.
customer_reviews.author: Reveal Consulting Group

customer_reviews.title: Best protection get a used one if you can.
customer_reviews.text: The best protection out there if you really want to keep it safe. I got a previously owned one that was never used for half price. I wish it had just a bit better screen sensitivity though. Ive noticed a difference but, I do not want to pay for another broken screen. My last ipad was never the same after screen repair because it started ghost typing.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri M Edwards

customer_reviews.title: The case is sturdy, that is exactly why I wanted it I ...
customer_reviews.text: The case is sturdy, that is exactly why I wanted it I wanted to protect my ipad in rough environments and it does that. It is slightly difficult to get the cover on and off. I wish it were easier and I don't really know why it is so hard. But, that is my only complaint. Yes, it is heavy. But then I expected it would be to protect the device, so that does not bother me. I'm very happy with it. I even like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Davey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product to protect your electronics!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I buy a new electronic device that Otterbox has a case for I almost always buy the Defender Series case to protect my purchase. This is the 3rd such case I have gotten from Amazon. It fits perfectly and provides optimum protection for the screen as well as the device. The added front cover with incorporated stand capability makes the case ideal for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Tweener

customer_reviews.title: I've used Otter boxes for 15 years to protect my cameras
customer_reviews.text: The "lid" doesn't go on or come off very easy. It does stay!; on banging around in my pack as I walk miles every day. The screen protector and the open casing are excellent. I have not dropped it on the sidewalk to give a crash test review.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Case that shipped is flawed...
customer_reviews.text: This product is flawed. After finding the time to online to learn how to install this Otterbox case onto my new iPad Air, I noticed an internal scratch in the plastic screen cover, basically looks like a scratch that melted into the screen cover. See photo - which shows the scratch in the light several inches above my thumb. Although I tried, I couldn't rub out the scratch from either side. Because my return date has passed, I'll have to live with this permanent scratch when viewing my iPad. Should have went with a different case. Talk about disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy...until it’s not.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic tab covering the home button began peeling off within 3 weeks of receiving it. After 12 months of use the outer rubber cover has stretched out so much that the hard plastic protective cover no longer clips into place and the rubber is constantly falling off. If you don’t mind replacing your $50 tablet case every year then this will be fine, otherwise don’t buy it. I have owned other otterbox cases before and they have been great so this was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bakken

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ll never worry about damaging my iPad Air again! This thing is built like a tank but not too bulky. Two minor points for consideration: there’s no way to attach a stylus, and if the cover is on the back of the iPad, it blocks the charging port. I don’t have a stylus and I don’t keep the cover on, so it’s perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: OtterBox has always been my go to for electronic cases. It has a cover for further protection which then turns into a stand that u can set your iPad on at two different angles. I’d say the ONLY negative to this case is the weight it adds which really isn’t much but to be honest I’d deal with the weight and protection over having to dish out money for repair because I had a thin light weight case. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Screen cover is iffy - but it realy works.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it's heavy. The plastic screen cover is less than perfect. Yet this case will truly protect your device from damage and it has a place to hold your pen! We have this case on ipad mini's, a 12.5" pro and now the smaller pro. Never had a problem beyond dirt getting under the screen protector. It WILL stop your ipad from bending, which happens very easily and leads to screen flickering.
customer_reviews.author: seven12

customer_reviews.title: bulky and hard to get on.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so much to have something durable and easy to use but I was never quite able to get it on my 7th generation Apple Airpad. In addition, I found it so bulky and unable to easily slip into my purse. Maybe if I had a bigger purse. So, back it went and I’m still looking.
customer_reviews.author: Alice P

customer_reviews.title: Used for a year...damaged my iPad
customer_reviews.text: I'm an intense gamer who uses my iPad an average of four hours per day. I purchased this case because of it's features and durability. I disassembled everything today for a cleaning and discovered that the inner plastic mold had left permanent marks and scratches on my iPad. I'm really disappointed and immediately switched to a different case. I would not recommend this product to anyone who values their device.
customer_reviews.author: jschweri

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of disappointed with this product. I usually love Otterbox products but this didn't seem to be up to par. The plastic screen protector peeled away quite easily as I was trying to insert my ipad. It also scratched very easily and I had a difficult time using my stylus with it. The entire case, while I understand it's purpose is to protect my ipad, was very bulky and heavy compared to similar cases I have seen. I felt like I could've expected more from the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy famojuro

customer_reviews.title: Wow is this thing snug and sturdy. The lid is a little much and makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow is this thing snug and sturdy. The lid is a little much and makes the beautifully slim iPad Pro 10.5 more of a behemoth. But the base and screen cover are perfection. Only use the lid if you're traveling and it's going into luggage, or if you need to prop it on a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T. Shaw MD

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox for 10.5” iPad
customer_reviews.text: Received 1 day early. It fits (Otterboxes always do). Secure feeling when holding. Yes the screen protector seems a little cheap. But, if you are careful it shouldn’t be a problem. You touch a touch screen with your finger or a stylus, not a knife. I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: consistent touch screen issues
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this gets 2 stars is the build quality is good and the stand is very useful. I have two of these(bought at the same time) and on both the touch screen constantly stops working. Its infuriating to be in the middle of something and lose control for 30 to 40 seconds at a time. Its also not sealed well. Small particulates consistenly sneak their way in between the protective screen and the iPad. I could live with the particulates but the touch screen issue desperately needs addressed. I have Otterbox products on my phone and other tablets and they have always been very good so I am very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but it’s a money saver!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to be sure that your iPad is protected from inadvertent slips, trips, stumbles and the like, then this is the perfect way to save your iPad. The unit itself is heavy, but again if you need the protection It’s more than worth it. I have not broken the screen nor damaged a corner of iPad. Not to mention that the box is none the worse for the wear. I’d buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Puma

customer_reviews.title: Solid case with great protection
customer_reviews.text: A really solid case providing excellent protection. By necessity, it is bulky. This version seems easier to put on and remove from my 10.5" Pro than the same was for my Air 2. I have a screen protector on the iPad but left the protector on the case on and together they do not interfere with touch or the Apple Pencil.
customer_reviews.author: DaveS

customer_reviews.title: What you need for your I-Psd
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set-up for protecting your I-pad. The top converts into a stand so the I-Pad can sit at a tilt like a laptop screen. Holds the unit in either the vertical or horizontal positions. Works best in the horizontal. All buttons are covered and the power port closes to protect from water. I'm impressed with the construction and impact resistance of the materials used. Has camera and speaker openings so you don't have to remove the protective backing during use. Several color options. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Windlord

customer_reviews.title: Solid Case
customer_reviews.text: Otterbox always makes a quality case. Only gripe would be the small openings in the screen cover at the top, they need to close these up. Dust/dirt gets in these holes & gets stuck BEHIND the screen protector (rubbing on the screen glass). Then you have to disassemble the whole thing to clean it out.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Duvall

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case for my iPad pro. I wanted a case that would protect the ipad as well as provide a place to store the pencil. This fit the bill as the case outside of the hard shell is slim enough to still hold without feeling bulky. The shell is great as a stand as well. I like that the two pieces/cases can easily be separated.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: I like Otter products
customer_reviews.text: I like Otter products. This is a good for parents with young children or your are near the water and want your phone covered well. NO its not waterproof. Lol Good product for protecting, so big and bulky. I used it only 3 days. Could barely use the iPad and also side buttons hard to use in the Otterbox. It was a waste of $80 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this case for more than a year, today I got to see it work and I’m still amazed. My iPad flew off the hood of my track @ 60mph on the service road, when I realized what it was, I pulled over and ran back for it. Laying on the exit ramp, I watched a car and a truck run over it with both tires each. Horrified I ran out and retrieved it before it could get hit again. To my amazement, there was no damaged done to the iPad. I’m using it to send this review. If I could give it more than 5 stars I would. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: rick brigham

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Protective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I dropped and broke my previous IPAD which shattered. My son was playing a racetrack game and one of his cars flew accidentally off the track into the otterbox screen. Not a scratch! GREAT case!! Worth the money! I know if I would have had this case on when I dropped my old ipad -it would still be in tact. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KEH2294

customer_reviews.title: Slim and lightweight but has scratches out of the box...
customer_reviews.text: Got it today and put it on the iPad and it feels great! Without the top casing part the otterbox case alone is slim and light weight and looks really clean. I am giving it three stars because I received it with a few scratches on the screen and I’m going to be contacting amazon about this. It sucks cause I was really excited to be able to use it at work. The scratches are small but noticeable when the case is on and the screen is dark :/. I’m calling Amazon to see what can be done
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: The case is pretty sturdy, and the screen cover that it comes ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a train commuter, and the last thing I want to worry about is people bumping into me on the platform or the train station and me having to worry about my ipad in my bag. The case is pretty sturdy, and the screen cover that it comes with isn't a problem to use with the apple pencil.
customer_reviews.author: chris m

customer_reviews.title: These cases are the absolute best the market provides
customer_reviews.text: We have always purchased otter box defender cases for all,of our iproducts. We have also never had a cracked or scratched screen when accidentally dropped. These cases are the absolute best the market provides. Looking forward to my next new iproduct and another defender case.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very unhappy with this OtterBox!! I would return but the return shipping to Amazon makes this option prohibitive. The touch Touch ID works very poorly. The button covers are stiff and make response difficult or nonexistent.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Protects iPad well
customer_reviews.text: Clunky to handle. Awkward. Difficult to push buttons. Well worth the small aggravations for the protection this thing gives the iPad. Also use Defenders on iPhones and they are great. Some issues with the plastic membranes coming loose over time with only moderate use, but also can put up with for now.
customer_reviews.author: Toomey

customer_reviews.title: A must have for every iPad owner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my iPad pro. I have always been a fan of otter box and it was a must have for me, as my iPad gets bumped and pushed around a lot, going all over the house and stepped on by my german shepherd. I know my iPad is safe in this case and won't have any issues! I love the stand case and it can hold the apple pen! highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katalina

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate Otterbox security.
customer_reviews.text: As with all Otterbox cases, you sacrifice some size & weight for great protection. Worth it for me for iPhones and iPads! I use the Apple Pencil a minority of the time and appreciate the storage clip and its location INSIDE the cover. Pencil will not fall out when case is closed.
customer_reviews.author: DAGAZON

customer_reviews.title: Premium iPad case.  Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this as a gift along with her new iPad. She is thrilled with it. It has a holder for the stylus and can be used to prop up the iPad in both horizontal and vertical orientation. Glad we bought the premium product - worth spending more.
customer_reviews.author: AmznCust

customer_reviews.title: No case is better
customer_reviews.text: I use this series on my phone and will not use another! This case is very durable. Only complaint is that I think the screen cover is not flush enough in done areas and it interferes with touch screen sensitivity. Plan to get an Apple pen to see if that is better than my fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the company otter box, but when I went to the web site I could only get black. So when I turned to amazon I was thrilled to find this color. The only down size is this case puts extra weight towards your iPad.
customer_reviews.author: C McKenney

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The instructions on how to assemble that come with this are useless. It’s laughable how different the illustrations look from how you actually do have to assemble the pieces. The plastic looks very cheap—like it’s not part of the device, rather the packaging. This is worth $40 at most.
customer_reviews.author: Cordelia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, protection, and functionality
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of using this case, I am quite pleased. It does a great job at protecting the screen and iPad in general. I have not had any issue like I have in the past with the built in screen protector getting dusty or distorting images. I am in fact using the very functional stand as I type this— it’s much better than the built in kick stands!
customer_reviews.author: Dakotah Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Feels very solid. Knowing that i was going to be bulky was not a problem, because I wasn’t planning on carrying it in my jeans pocket (buyers should just be aware that protection does add bulk). Excellent buy, just dismayed that it arrived a day after I got my screen cracked. Now I have absolutely no worries at all about accidental 3 foot drops
customer_reviews.author: aeroPilot

customer_reviews.title: Video shown is not the same product
customer_reviews.text: The "how to install" video shows a different product. Additionally for those complaining about the plastic screen cover: I removed mine(carefully) with a small knife. It just peels off. I added a tempered glass screen protector. Makes this product light years better than with the plastic protector it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Longevity of this product
customer_reviews.text: The OtterBox is sturdy and protects the iPad (10.7 pro) and does a very good job doing so. The problem is longevity in that the soft rubber cushion for gripping and holding everything together stretches and it begins loosening after about a year to the point where it just does not protect from external dust. Going to request a warranty replacement. Will update this review after contacting the company. Update: No hassle replacement . . . . $6.99 FedEx shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: You won’t go wrong with an Otter box
customer_reviews.text: I’m a first timer when it comes to having one. I’m rather clumsy, my son recommended getting an Otter box for this reason. It has saved my device from getting injured or broken. Plus it came in my favorite color. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: This is how to protect an iPad!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this case from the minute I took it out and installed it till now. I cannot imagine a more versatile, protective, yet logical and reasonable, system for protecting the delicate instruments inside! Another amazing Otterbox product (my second)!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Mook

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: An improved OtterBox case from previous versions.. Perfect fit and protection for an iPad Air 3. The company’s Limited Lifetime Warranty is honored. Amazon delivered it quickly. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Lfa1

customer_reviews.title: and the bottom allows me to prop the iPad for easy viewing of movies or whatever else I need to ...
customer_reviews.text: It adds a bit of weight to the iPad, but that is a small price to pay for the security and protection this case offers. I use it on the plane, and the bottom allows me to prop the iPad for easy viewing of movies or whatever else I need to see.
customer_reviews.author: JUDY MULDAWER

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Having it for a few months. My iPad Pro is cracked. Very disappointed.. i have had otter box before and never had this issue. But been in the tough case it still broke the glass when I fell into the ground. Not a happy customers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we wanted for the new Ipad Air. It's funny how each Ipad you buy is a different size which requires a new case. This one is a perfect fit and great quality
customer_reviews.author: hippie hoppie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but OTTERBOX for my devices!
customer_reviews.text: I tried other brands, but nothing makes me feel content than Otterbox Defender Series. I just hate how dust/small dirt particles manage to seep through the cracks and openings, especially when I am being diligent with cleaniness with my iPad Pro 10.5. Product arrived promptly. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: MSW2017

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox did it again!
customer_reviews.text: I got this Otterbox Defender for iPad Air (3rd gen) for a family member and was impressed with how sturdy the case is without adding a whole ton of weight. The volume/power buttons are still easy to use, and you still have access to the screen without it interfering with any of the gestures iPadOS. I wish it came in different colors besides black - but it is still a great choice to protect an iPad Air!
customer_reviews.author: Wheatley96

customer_reviews.title: There has to be a better case elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Front screen is not clear and came with knicks and blurred spots
customer_reviews.author: Mario A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection!
customer_reviews.text: Same great OtterBox Defender! No problems, no issues. Does exactly what it says. Worth every penny. Already dropped my iPad from 5ft on to tile floor and not a mark or problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Heavy for travel
customer_reviews.text: very heavy and hard to open. I was unable to take it apart for fear of breaking it. did not like the material, felt spongy somewhat like styrofoam, although more durable. would be very good for travel but not for day to day use. the window where the apple logo shows through was scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelia B

customer_reviews.title: Protect your iPad! It has saved mine!!
customer_reviews.text: My man insisted I put my new Ipad in this case. It has probably saved it 50 times since Chirstmas. It is like a suitcase. If you drop stuff or have small children who do, dogs that knock your stuff over, or just accident prone...get this case. Indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: Kayak Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great otter box product but it’s kind of hard to open/detach, like when the iPad is inside and I want to use it, it’s difficult to pull the otter box case apart
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: This thing is rugged to the core. But I ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is rugged to the core. But I have yet to test it with an angry kid throwing the ipad on a tantrum. I will update it once that happens
customer_reviews.author: Junix

customer_reviews.title: Nice protection, love the colors
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my new iPad Pro and it’s fantastic! I thought it would be a bit bulky but it’s really not and I love the colors! I’ve had it for a few months now and it has held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Leo0007

customer_reviews.title: INDESTRUCTIBLE CASE
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Otterbox Defender case for my iPads. They are literally indestructible. I highly recommend this case if you have small children. My son seems to drop everything and this thing seems bulletproof. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: bdogg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I am a SUPER clumsy person. So this thing has been a God Sent! I only had to buy a new one due to the Apple iPad Pro not being sold in a 9.5" anymore, BUT luckily this one fits the 10.5" like a glove!!! It is heavy but so is the iPad Pro 10.5". So... It is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Neal & Suzannah

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my new iPad Pro, after dropping ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new iPad Pro, after dropping my old one which fell out of the case it was in. Tis holds the iPad securely and when fully closed I can't envision the iPad ever being damaged.
customer_reviews.author: GIS student

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: When the screen shield is on the back, the camera is covered.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: If your accident prone, this is the device for you. The only down side is that you can not make your iPad stand/sit upright like it does in the “normal” cases.
customer_reviews.author: KuTeePy77

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reliable protection
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to protect iPad. Dropped last one after a couple years, but that's all it takes. Like the "extra" cover (don't use at home) I put on when I take it on the road. And can let my daughter use it with no worries.
customer_reviews.author: T Frese

customer_reviews.title: didn’t see anything wrong with it nor did I notice any cosmetic issue like the listing stated
customer_reviews.text: The item was a restock but it looks brand new, didn’t see anything wrong with it nor did I notice any cosmetic issue like the listing stated. It fits my iPad perfectly and it’s well protected with the dual casing. It does get in the way of using the Touch ID but I rather type in my password then to risk dropping my iPad without protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Protection and security
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, thick and bulky. Designed to protect the flimsy and thin ipad air for my teenage boy to use. The front shield is the perfect stand!
customer_reviews.author: Restitution G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for person with new iPad. My OtterBox saved an iPad that bounced down multiple stairs with absolutely no damage to tablet. Love OtterBox products. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Blp

customer_reviews.title: case 2 slippery/Film over home button stretches out/causes failures/charging port 2 recessed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy iPad case, complete with a versatile stand which accommodates both landscape and portrait formats and at two comfortable readinging angles.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeTS

customer_reviews.title: new design
customer_reviews.text: I love Otter box. I started with the defender series for iPad and years ago when i purchased it the biggest issue i had was the soft plastic encasing. With use, it broke off in small areas. With life time guarantee, Otter replaced it. The new plastic encasing is not as soft and is more durable, its a bit stiffer than the previous, but is an excellent upgrade to the defender series. I recommend the Defender series for those active or like myself clumsy individuals.
customer_reviews.author: Phfor

customer_reviews.title: Otter Box best on the market !!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with Otter Box . They are amazingly sturdy products but heavy! I gave a four star because I received this product damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kimiko

customer_reviews.title: Beats all others I tested for this new IPad Pro model
customer_reviews.text: First experience with Otterbox and I am not disappointed. Purchased two more for my family and we all love them. Amazon was out of stock when ordered but when back in stock, gave me a discount and sent overnight! Who could ask for more?
customer_reviews.author: Bob Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ok, needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Bulky. Can't really get the pop up latch to prop up my iPad Pro. Two seperate pieces in lieu of a hing. Rally does not hold iPencil well.
customer_reviews.author: FD Firefighter 121

customer_reviews.title: Rugged
customer_reviews.text: I like it but i feel like it could be softer and it is very hard plastic. However, i keep it because my last ipad lasted multiple tumbles with the defender and never scratch
customer_reviews.author: interested persons

customer_reviews.title: A great buy, especially if you're a little clumsy, like me.
customer_reviews.text: A great case! I have an OtterBox on my iPad and iPhone and wouldn't carry either without the OtterBox. I've dropped both countless times and the OtterBox has kept them safe and sound through it all.
customer_reviews.author: mafitts

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: We added this case to protect from a 7 year old. She uses her iPad every day. It has held up very well, and the versatility makes it very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Definitely holds up!
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy. We bought it in case our toddler will get his hands on it. And of course he has, its withheld it being tossed and stepped on by him. I like the fact it holds the pen in place so we don’t loose it. Just wished it had a spot to put the small charge adapter since that’s small and easy to loose.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. It makes my iPad a little bulky but it keeps it safe. My last iPad was in this case for 2 years, was dropped down the stairs by my kids, sat on and the case became cracked but my iPad still looks brand new. So when I bought a newer iPad, I had to make sure I kept it safe as well. So bought another one. 100% recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: sissy434

customer_reviews.title: great protection
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for protection, then this is your product. nice to have in hands. keep in mind that it adds some weight and thickness to the ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Imad BOU JAOUDE

product_meta.title: OtterBox DEFENDER SERIES Case for iPad Pro 10.5" & iPad Air (3rd Generation) - Frustration Free Packaging - BLACK
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingWorry less while you're on the job. Defender Series for iPad Pro (10.5-inch) combines three ultra-tough layers to guard your device against serious drops, dirt, scrapes and bumps. The built-in screen film stops display scratches, plus the included shield stand gives you hands-free viewing convenience. Defender Series works hard to protect your device every day.
feature_bullets: Triple-layer defense: inner shell, outer cover and touchscreen protector
Screen protection: built in to keep your brilliant display flawless
Port covers: stop dirt, dust and lint from getting into jacks and ports
Shield stand: includes stand for hands-free convenience

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,091 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
